actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to encourage the utilization of sound management practices in dredged material disposal areas of the Nation.

summary.text: Disposal Area Management Act - Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to utilize and encourage the utilization of disposal area management practices designed to minimize the need for new dredged material disposal areas.

titles.title: A bill to encourage the utilization of sound management practices in dredged material disposal areas of the Nation.
